title: Discovery QRD-056: paradigm_shift
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) exhibits novel properties under paradigm_shift transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: A pioneering implementable distributed paradigm inversion of Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) with proprietary unique advantages challenging fundamental assumptions through distributed parallel innovation through 2 interaction patterns

function apply_paradigm_shift(system):
